name: Nomad (itch) (Pão Game Studio)
description:
Nomad is a strategic sci-fi adventure where you take control of a child, daughter of a Spatial Bounty Hunter.

Against all the odds, using an aerial camera, stealthy action, sabotage techniques and gadgets, achieve victory against the army that pursue you.

- Features -
  • Make your way through the level stealthly
  • Collect items and add them to your inventory
  • Stay out of the enemy's vision and don't do too much noise
- Moving Forward -
  • Gadgets that you can equip and use an ability
  • Quick save and load
  • More levels
  • Shaders Optimizaton
  • New Animations
  • UI Optimizations
